abstract.t: This document sets out a series of recommendations and proposals to the IETF Community from the IETF Administration LLC following a review of the IETF meeting venue requirements. Editorial Note Discussion of this draft takes place on the gendispatch mailing list, which has its home page at <https://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/ gendispatch>. The source code and an issues list for this draft can be found at <https://github.com/JayDaley/draft-daley-gendispatch-venue- requirements>.
